鴸字的基本解释

鴸
zhū
古代传说中的一种不吉祥的怪鸟，形状像猫头鹰而长着人手。

鴸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhū］
［《廣韻》陟輸切，平虞，知。］
［《廣韻》章俱切，平虞，章。］
传说中的鸟名。

鴸字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鴸； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1488第07
【廣韻】章俱切【集韻】鍾輸切，?音朱。【玉篇】鳥似雞。【廣韻】鳥似鴟也。【山海經】柜山有鳥，其狀如鴟而人手，其音如痺，名鴸。【註】痺，鶉之䳄者。又【廣韻】陟輸切【集韻】追輸切，?音株。鳥名。

鴸字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鴸字的起名意思

暂无。

鴸
Basic explanation of words
鴸
zhū
An inauspicious bird in ancient legends, shaped like an owl with human hands.
鴸
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhū］
["Guangyun" Zhi loses and cuts, Pingyu, knows. ]
["Guangyun" chapter all cut, Pingyu, chapter. ]
The legendary bird name.
鴸
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鴸; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1488 Page 07
[Guang Yun] Zhang Juqie [Ji Yun] Zhong Shuqie,? Yin Zhu. [Jade articles] Birds are like chickens. [Guang Yun] Birds are like owls. [Shanhaijing] There are birds in the cabinet mountain, their shape is like a horned owl but human hands, and their sound is like a paralysis, their name is 鴸. [Note] Bi, quail of quail. And [Guang Yun] Zhi lose cut [Ji Yun] chase lose cut,? Sound strain. The name of the bird.
鴸
